properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 8:22AM CST until January 10 at 5:20AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Rises continue along the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam.
Levels remain in flood stage and will crest below moderate flood stage
on Monday. Overflow into surrounding pasture lands and secondary roads
can be expected to continue.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until late Thursday night...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Sunday the stage was 96.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 97.9 feet by
tomorrow early afternoon . The river will fall below flood stage
Thursday afternoon.
* Impact...At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood. At 94 feet...Some secondary roads in the area begin to
flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
